sub_title: Lead for Sustainability and Supply Chain Management
summary:
Arjen is the person that can help your company to further improve your business processes. He combines functional (SAP) skills with business knowledge (high-tech, manufacturing, semiconductor) and leverages his analytical competency to successfully define and realize your business cases. Especially that combination is highly appreciated by Arjen's customers.

Over the past few years Arjen was involved in several full-cycle implementations, most of those related to Supply Chain Management. Building on his functional background in several logistical modules of SAP, Arjen successfully fulfils roles as project leader and lead consultant. He is knowledgeable in the specifics of multiple industries. The combination of IT and business knowledge allows him to easily switch between business-speak and IT-speak. Arjen connects people with different backgrounds.

As project leader with a functional (SAP) background, Arjen understands the reasoning behind a project, not only the technical realization. He guides business users and helps them identify the main drivers for their business cases. Arjen motivates, drives and builds teams as he has a strong interest in people development, innovation and business process improvements.

profile_positions.description:
WeFabricate is a fast-growing manufacturing company based in the Netherlands. To support their needs for an integrated ERP-system, McCoy & Partners is now implementing S/4HANA Public Cloud.

Production ramps up! FAST! So the timelines for the SAP-implementation are very short. Together with the team and a major effort from business and consultants' side, we're going live after a 2 months project! Tight deadlines, very strict scope control and a fully dedicated time, committed to making the impossible, possible!
profile_positions.title: Projectmanager S/4HANA Public Cloud

profile_positions.description: AMS and Osram are going to integrate their business and software systems. Arjen is involved as supply chain architect. His experience with large international customers in the semiconductor business helps the new company to thrive and grow in an ever-changing world.
profile_positions.title: Supply Chain solution architect

profile_positions.description:
McCoy & Partners advises on improvements and simplification of business processes. We are doing this with a team of highly knowledgeable, skilled and committed consultants. 

In a joint responsibility with my colleague Business Unit Lead we are responsible for growing the team both from the perspective of improving the skill sets as well as in numbers. It's our mission to drive simplicity and to employ the top-100 SAP consultants in The Netherlands.
profile_positions.title: Business Unit Lead Simply Supply Chain

profile_positions.description:
Irish Distillers is looking to expand their business; a key driver in that is improving Supply Chain and Finance excellence. Focus is on standardisation of software and automation of manual tasks; thereby leveraging the benefits of integrated software systems. 

Arjen came onboard to drive and deliver multiple changes in the Metis Supply Chain improvement program. Soon that project developed into a greater endeavour of implementing S/4HANA. This prepares Irish Distillers for future growth and for realisation of their goals. 

We were successful because of the combined involvement and efforts of the McCoy and Irish Distillers team. That, together with perseverance, strict scope management, meticulous preparation and great testing effort led to a smooth go-live. With minimal business disruption and a hypercare phase without major incidents, the S/4HANA project was successfully delivered in September 2020.
profile_positions.title: Project Manager

profile_positions.description: Responsible for the carve-out of the IT supply chain part of Lumileds out of Philips Lighting. Besides that working on improving the IT supply chain with two major extensions. A major topic is the definition and delivery of a global demand and supply planning paradigm, supported by SAP IBP S&OP. Second topic, is extending the Lumileds supply chain outside the company, by enabling SAP SNC for close interaction with customers and suppliers.
profile_positions.title: Project Lead Supply Chain in STAR program

profile_positions.description:
Late 2012 the project to migrate Lumileds from their old JDE system into SAP started. In a highly demanding environment we have implemented the Philips template for Lumileds. After a successful go-live in February 2014 we have improved user experience and usability in the wave 2 program. 

Since August 2014 we are working on setting up a completely new flow out of China. Lumileds has high expectations on the additional business that will be generated by this setup. I am involved as architect and project manager. This project is again quite demanding, since Lumileds and the Automotive division  are being disentangled from the Philips Lighting system while this project is executed.
profile_positions.title: Functional Lead Supply Chain & Project manager China Midpower

profile_positions.description:
SAP SNC expert, devoted to improve supply chain collaboration. Analyze logistical processes of major companies. Search for solutions to overcome any issues or to achieve process improvements. Customize new / changed business process into SAP (SCM and R/3).

Also responsible for recruitment of future colleagues in the SCM area. Next to that I'm stimulating the development of innovation into practical propositions.
profile_positions.title: Managing consultant Supply Chain

profile_positions.description: Philips manages the inventory for selected (large) key accounts. As a projectleader Mr. Van der Sluijs has just concluded the implementation of APO VMI at a large Belgian retailer.
profile_positions.title: APO VMI implementation

profile_positions.description:
Mr. Van der Sluijs has been the projectleader of the rollout of the Global ATP template to Canada, Singapore, Malaysia and Thailand.

The project goal is reducing stock points and improving service level by implementing global deliveries from one stockpoint directly to customers. As the various Philips organizations use different R/3 kernels we used APO to provide global Available-To-Promise information.
profile_positions.title: G-ATP Rollout

profile_positions.description:
Virco is a Philips Lighting sales organization that specialized in selling so-called stencil brands to customers. They were migrated from the Luminaires R/3 system to the Lamps R/3 system. The character of this project was data migration and training of end-users.

The Eindhoven based competence center of Philips Lighting maintains and develops SAP services for the European Philips organization. Mr. van der Sluijs developed and implemented a new test process. An automated test tool guarantees the functional and technical integrity of the European SAP system.
profile_positions.title: Multidisciplinary roles (Test Officer + SD Consultant)
